info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 14 at 5:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A band of rain and snow showers with gusty winds will impact portions of southeastern Lewis and Clark, Broadwater, west central Meagher, northwestern Madison, northwestern Beaverhead and Jefferson Counties through 600 AM MDT... At 458 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking rain and snow showers along a line extending from 13 miles northeast of East Helena to 19 miles west of Salmon. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. Light accumulating snow on mountain passes SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Roads will become slick after the passage of the showers, while travelers over mountain passes may experience reduced visibility in blowing snow. Locations impacted include... Helena, Townsend, Boulder, East Helena, Whitehall, Jackson, Montana City, Wisdom, Basin, Fort Logan On The Smith River, Melrose, York, Rimini, Alhambra, Corbin, Spring Meadow Lake State Park, Fort Logan, Austin, Glen and Winston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
